amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to prohibit the use of funds to negotiate or enter into an agreement with Vietnam for the repatriation of Vietnamese immigrants who arrived in the United States before July 12, 1995.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A092) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A092) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A092) offered by Mr. Rouda.
